element.name: linsyssdisink
element.description: Writes video from SDI transmit device
element.author: David Schleef <ds@entropywave.com>

caps.name: sink
caps.details: video/x-raw-yuv, format=(fourcc)UYVY, width=(int)720, height=(int)480, pixel-aspect-ratio=(fraction)10/11, framerate=(fraction)30000/1001, interlaced=(boolean)true, colorspec=(string)sdtv, chroma-site=(string)mpeg2

element.name: linsyssdisrc
element.description: Reads video from SDI capture device
element.author: David Schleef <ds@entropywave.com>

caps.name: src
caps.details: video/x-raw-yuv, format=(fourcc)UYVY, width=(int)720, height=(int)480, pixel-aspect-ratio=(fraction)10/11, framerate=(fraction)30000/1001, interlaced=(boolean)true, colorspec=(string)sdtv, chroma-site=(string)mpeg2
